column5: Those are some amazing pictures you took there.
Great shots! Reminds me of some of the runs in BC. Looks like you could walk bank to bank across their backs! A thing of beauty, thanks for sharing.
Wow, you are insane! But your enthusiasm is infectious
That is correct sir. Even if it was legal to fish this spot, there would be no point even trying. Quite a sight though  .
Awesome pics!!
Exactly.........  That would be more fun to me to just sit and watch their behavior, than to even think about wetting a line.  GLAD to hear that is a protected occurance, thats just awesome
You don't, LOL......there almost always sanctuaries !!!
That's amazing, never seen that many in one spot before. It's cool how you can see the color differences on each fish when there side by side like that.

I think I'm gonna let Cliff tell the story, but another friend of mine Andrew and myself hooked up with Cliff today and we found a huge run of chromers!  (these pic's are all from today)        (I should probably mention we didn't fish this spot, LOL!)
My goodness!!!... Look at all those overgrown minnows!!!
Uhhhhhhhhhhhhh Uhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh  Oh Boy.
Nice Pic's... Now l need a cold shower... Peace Ken
wow thats a long haul you took
That dam is stacked
WOW!!! Where's my trident!?!
wow thats awesome, makes me want to take up fly fishing again.

WOW  I think I may know what flow that is, I was up at a customer yesterday and he was talking about a few hundred bows in a certain flow.... I hope this area is a sanctuary though.... and thank god thats not Bronte....  Burt
very cool shots
Great shots, That would be awesome to see. I saw some this year, but not nearly like that. Totally awesome.
Oooooooo !!!!  Sweeeeeeet !!!
Wow!  That's amazing.
yeah i've seen something like that except the fish were in a hole and hungry! And we had it ALLLLLLLLLL to ourselves....muahahaha
Ya what Ken said
Thats freaking awesome last time i witnessed something like that was at maitland cohos rushed in so fast they was hitting my legs in 3 fow.
i have never seeen so many in a run, wooooow
Wow. Who cares if you wet a line just seeing that would be good enough!
Awesome!  I have a question....how would someone go about fishing such a huge glut of fish in water that shallow?  stuntman
Beauty site.  Sherriff
You wouldn't... Ethically I don't think that would be right... thats why Solo took some pics and went on his way...  Burt
Maybe this weather has them thinking its time for a spring spawn thoses are some huge numbers of fish

Report will have to come Friday morning...I'm a little tired after fishing all day with Solopaddler and his buddy...then meeting up with bly to do a little night fishing...LOL  I must be insane.....  I think I'm falling aslee.................................................................................  ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ
This has to be the best fish porn of the year!
I agree with not fishing that amazing happening, just something to enjoy and wonder about.  Great post, solopaddler and ccmt.  Thanks much.
